spatial_accuracy.notes: Room placement is mostly correct, but several walls are misaligned. Door placements are largely incorrect in terms of position and orientation. Window placements are significantly incorrect, with some missing and others misplaced. Room proportions are distorted in several areas.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is not consistently preserved from the floor plan, appearing uniform throughout the 3D render. Door embeddings are incorrect, with many appearing as simple openings or misaligned. Adjacency relationships are broadly maintained but specific room dimensions are altered. Many rooms, such as the two smaller toilets, utility, and parts of the balconies, are missing or significantly altered. No hallucinated rooms, but significant alterations to existing ones.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is inaccurate; many items from the floor plan are missing, and some of the placed furniture does not match type or arrangement. Furniture scale consistency is poor; many items appear oversized or undersized relative to the rooms and other features.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric camera correctness and orthographic projection accuracy are good. Lighting quality is decent but lacks sophistication. Geometry is clean with no obvious distortions. Visual clarity and composition are good for a basic render.

detected_errors.description: Missing Toilet 1.52x2.45, 5'0"x8'0" next to M.Bedroom.
Missing Toilet 1.27x2.40, 4'6"x7'10" next to M.Bedroom balcony.
Missing Toilet 1.52x2.45, 5'0"x8'0" next to Bedroom-1.
Missing Laundry/Utility 3.02x2.40, 10'0"x8'0".
Missing Balcony 1.27x2.40, 4'6"x7'10" off M.Bedroom.
Missing Balcony 3.66x1.37, 12'0"x4'6" off Living & Dining.
Missing or significantly altered entrance area and adjacent walls/rooms.
Missing doors for multiple rooms, including toilets, utility, and entrance.
Missing multiple windows as depicted in the floor plan, especially in toilets and utility.
Misplaced door to Master Bedroom, shifted along the wall.
Misplaced door to Bedroom-1, shifted along the wall.
Misplaced door to Bedroom-2, shifted along the wall.
Misplaced wall separating Living & Dining from the corridor leading to M.Bedroom/Bedroom-1. The 'Wide Passage' is not accurately represented.
Misplaced window in Bedroom-1 and Bedroom-2, shifted and size altered.
Incorrect placement of the window on the external wall near the Living & Dining area.
Incorrect orientation of doors for Master Bedroom, Bedroom-1, and Bedroom-2 (swing direction and hinge placement).
Proportion distortion of the Master Bedroom, appears narrower than indicated.
Proportion distortion of the Living & Dining area, width appears altered.
Proportion distortion of the Kitchen, appears squarer than indicated.
Wall thickness inconsistency across the render; all internal walls appear to have uniform thickness, different from the floor plan.
Hallucinated wall segments near the entrance and what appears to be a staircase leading down, which is not present in the floor plan.
Hallucinated internal partition/feature near the kitchen area not present in a 2D plan.
Hallucinated exterior boundary wall/feature on the right side of the plan, extending beyond the original footprint.
